title: Ethan’s Resume
text:
Data Scientist • Machine Learning Specialist • BYU–Idaho

e.s.w.saline@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/ethan-saline | (682) 258-1024



Data Science student applying machine learning, statistical modeling, and programming to real-world research and analytics problems.


Machine learning, predictive modeling, statistical analysis, data wrangling, data visualization, Python/R/SQL, and applied analytics.



Time series forecasting, supervised learning, model interpretability, data engineering for ML systems, and educational data analytics.




April 2023 – December 2026
Brigham Young University–Idaho
Data Science Major • Statistics Minor
- Current GPA: 3.98
- Relevant coursework: Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Time Series Analysis, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
- Experience with real-world projects using Python, R, and SQL



Stanford University Online
- Supervised Learning Algorithms
- Unsupervised Learning Algorithms
- Advanced Learning Models
- Machine Learning Specialization
Brigham Young University–Idaho
- Machine Learning Certificate



April 2025 – Present
Data Science Lab Manager — BYU–Idaho
- Designed and implemented data collection/analysis systems to support departmental research and student projects
- Mentored students in machine learning, statistics, and programming (Python, R, SQL)
- Supported project pipelines from data acquisition to model evaluation
April 2024 – Present
Data Science Programming TA — BYU–Idaho
- Assisted instruction for in-person and online Data Science Programming courses (60+ students)
- Guided students through Python, R, and SQL best practices, debugging, data wrangling, and visualization
- Held tutoring hours, graded assignments, and provided individualized performance feedback
August 2024 – Present
Math Tutor & Supervisor — BYU–Idaho
- Tutored students in calculus, statistics, and quantitative reasoning
- Supervised peer tutors, ensuring consistency and high-quality academic support




Programming: Python, R, SQL

Libraries/Tools: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, ggplot

Methods: Machine learning, predictive modeling, time series forecasting, data visualization

Languages: Portuguese (fluent)

Academic: Statistics, calculus, bioinformatics foundations




August 2021 – October 2021
Anderson Cleaning — Bookkeeper & Operations Assistant
- Built a tracking system for client billing and service logs
- Organized schedules and streamlined operational workflows
August 2020 – August 2021
Walmart — Inventory / CAP2 Stocker
- Managed overstock inventory and supported store operations with consistent overtime
- Demonstrated reliability, teamwork, and strong time management in a fast-paced environment



October 2021 – October 2023
Missionary — Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, São Paulo, Brazil
- Trained and mentored teams of missionaries; developed leadership and cross-cultural communication
- Served as Zone Leader overseeing multiple teams and reporting performance to regional leadership
- Managed mission finances as Financial Secretary, ensuring accurate rent payments and account reconciliation ““”
file_path = “/mnt/data/ethan_saline_resume.qmd” with open(file_path, “w”, encoding=“utf-8”) as f: f.write(content)
print(f”Created: {file_path}“)
